data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 42,765 believers in Overijssel against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Overijssel, Netherlands

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Overijssel, Netherlands.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 24 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, make the 42,765 believers in Overijssel to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,022,935 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Overijssel, Netherlands a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Arab, Iraqi people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Over 53.13 percent of the people of Overijssel are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
God, guide the 42,765 believers in Overijssel to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Overijssel, Netherlands has a population of 1,065,700.

We estimate Overijssel has 42,765 people who might know Jesus, 456,706 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 566,229 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 24 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Overijssel, Netherlands to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,022,935 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood
